DOC.brief_title: Tear Osmolarity Changes After Instilling Isotonic Hyaluronate Artificial Tears

Comfort rating show significant difference time . Conclusions : We conclude , although hyaluronate bind water , significantly alter tear osmolarity osmolarity similar tear .
